content: The correspondence of the Single Sign-On attributes to the entries of the 'Accounts' section.

comment.text: This translation key is used for a tooltip that describes the purpose of matching Single Sign-On attributes to account entries in the 'Accounts' section. It appears as an icon button next to a form field on a settings page. Translators should provide a clear and concise explanation of this process for internationalization purposes.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English content describes a correspondence, but the Arabic translation simply states 'matching.' While 'matching' isn't *wrong*, it loses the nuance of a direct correspondence or mapping.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: تطابق سمات Single Sign-On مع إدخالات قسم 'الحسابات' أو 'ربط سمات Single Sign-On مع إدخالات قسم 'الحسابات'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Birdəfəlik Giriş Atributları "Hesablar" bölməsindəki qeydlərə uyğundur.' is a bit too literal and could be improved for clarity and natural flow in Azerbaijani. 'Single Sign-On attributes' translates to 'Tək Giriş Atributları', not 'Birdəfəlik Giriş Atributları'.  The phrase 'uyğundur' is accurate, but the overall sentence structure could be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Tək Giriş Atributları "Hesablar" bölməsinin qeydləri ilə üst-üstə düşür.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'üst-üstə düşür' (overlaps) might be preferable to 'uyğundur' (is suitable/matches) in this context to accurately convey the idea of attribute mapping.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider replacing 'uyğundur' with 'üst-üstə düşür'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The German translation uses «» (guillemets) for enclosing the word 'Accounts'. This is less common in German and might be better replaced with standard quotation marks ("").
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Die Entsprechung der Single-Sign-On-Attribute zu den Einträgen des Bereichs "Konten".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Kertakirjautumisattribuuttien viestintä Tilit-osion merkintöjen kanssa' doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'The correspondence of the Single Sign-On attributes to the entries of the 'Accounts' section.' The word 'viestintä' (communication) isn't the best fit. 'Correspondence' implies a matching or mapping relationship, which isn't captured.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kertakirjautumisattribuuttien vastaavuus 'Tilit'-osion merkintöjen kanssa.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English text uses single quotes around 'Accounts'. The Finnish translation should also use single quotes around 'Tilit' for consistency.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kertakirjautumisattribuuttien vastaavuus 'Tilit'-osion merkintöjen kanssa.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Armenian translation "Single Sign-On-ի համապատասխանությունը վերագրվում է «Հաշիվներ» բաժնի գրառումներին:" doesn't fully capture the meaning of 'The correspondence of the Single Sign-On attributes to the entries of the 'Accounts' section.' The word 'վերագրվում է' (is attributed to) is awkward and shifts the meaning. It implies something is being assigned, rather than a simple matching or correspondence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Single Sign-On-ի յուրահատկությունները համապատասխանում են «Հաշիվներ» բաժնում եղած գրանցումներին:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'յուրահատկությունները համապատասխանում են' could be slightly improved for a more natural flow. While grammatically correct, it's a bit stiff.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Single Sign-On-ի դաշտերը համապատասխանում են «Հաշիվներ» բաժնում եղած գրանցումներին:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Account' is singular in the Italian translation. The English text refers to 'Accounts' (plural).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: La corrispondenza degli attributi Single Sign-On con le voci della sezione 'Account'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Korean translation '싱글 사인온 속성의 대응' is a literal translation of 'Single Sign-On attributes' and 'correspondence'. A more natural and clear Korean phrasing would be needed to convey the meaning of attribute mapping. The current translation sounds awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: '계정' 섹션 항목과 싱글 사인온 속성 간의 연관 관계

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Korean translation lacks proper spacing and could be improved for readability.  Specifically, the connecting particles need more thoughtful arrangement.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: '계정' 섹션 항목에 대한 싱글 사인온 속성 연관 관계

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'ການຕອບສະ ໜອງ' (kan top sa nong) while meaning 'response' or 'correspondence' isn't the most natural phrasing in this context. 'ການກົງຈັກ' (kan kong jak) would be a more accurate translation for 'correspondence' or 'matching'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ການກົງຈັກຂອງຄຸນລັກສະນະການເຂົ້າສູ່ລະບົບດຽວຕໍ່ກັບລາຍການຂອງພາກສ່ວນ 'ບັນຊີ'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English term 'entries' is better translated as 'velden' or 'gegevens' in this context, as 'items' is somewhat vague and doesn't fully convey the meaning of entries in a database or configuration.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: De correspondentie van de Single Sign-On attributen met de velden/gegevens van de "Accounts" sectie.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Corespondenţa atributelor SSO cu intrările din secţiunea Conturi' is a literal translation, but 'SSO' might not be immediately understandable to all users. A more user-friendly translation would explain what SSO stands for or use a more common term.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Corespondența atributelor de autentificare unică (SSO) cu intrările din secțiunea Conturi.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'Corespondența' is technically correct, 'corespondența' (lowercase initial) is more common in Romanian.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: corespondența atributelor de autentificare unică (SSO) cu intrările din secțiunea Conturi.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'ආරෝපණය කරයි' (arōpaṇayākarēdī) implies 'charges' or 'credits', which doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'correspondence'. The English refers to a mapping or association.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: තනි පිවිසුම් අනුරූපතා 'ගිණුම්' කොටසේ නිවේශිත වලට ගැmatch කරයි.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure 'තනි පිවිසුම් අනුරූපතා ... ගැmatch කරයි' sounds somewhat unnatural in Sinhala. While 'ගැmatch කරයි' is understandable, a more idiomatic phrasing would be preferable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: තනි පිවිසුම් අනුරූපතා 'ගිණුම්' කොටසේ නිවේශිත වලට අදාළ වේ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of 'ගැmatch කරයි' which is a loan word from English 'match' is not ideal for a professional context. It lacks the sophistication needed for UI text. While understandable, it's a less elegant choice.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: තනි පිවිසුම් අනුරූපතා 'ගිණුම්' කොටසේ නිවේශිත වලට අතථම වේ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Zhoda atribútov jednotného prihlásenia so záznamami v sekcii „Účty“' while understandable, doesn't fully capture the nuance of the English 'The correspondence of the Single Sign-On attributes to the entries of the 'Accounts' section.' A more precise translation would convey the idea of 'matching' or 'mapping'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Zhodnosť atribútov jednotného prihlásenia s položkami v sekcii 'Účty'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'Одговарајуће' (Odgovarajuće) translates to 'corresponding' or 'matching', but in this context, a simpler and more natural translation would be 'Усклађење' (Usklađenje) which means 'alignment' or 'matching'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Усклађење Single Sign-On атрибута са уносима одељка 'Налози'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not a major issue, adding a colon after 'Налози' would improve readability and match the English sentence structure.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Усклађење Single Sign-On атрибута са уносима одељка 'Налози':

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Odgovarajuće Single Sign-On atributa sa unosima odeljka 'Nalozi'' is a literal translation that doesn't quite convey the intended meaning. 'Odgovarajuće' implies 'corresponding' but the structure is awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Single Sign-On atributi usklađeni sa unosima odeljka 'Nalozi'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of single quotes around 'Nalozi' is inconsistent with common Serbian capitalization practices. It should likely be double quotes or no quotes at all.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Single Sign-On atributi usklađeni sa unosima odeljka "Nalozi".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Tekli Oturum Açma öznitelikleri 'Hesaplar' bölümündeki girişlere karşılık gelir' is a bit literal. While technically correct, it could be more natural-sounding in Turkish. 'Karşılık gelir' is grammatically correct, but 'eşleşir' (matches) or 'ilişkilendirilir' (is associated) might be better choices depending on the exact meaning intended.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Tekli Oturum Açma öznitelikleri, 'Hesaplar' bölümündeki girişlerle eşleşir.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "Single Sign-On attributes" is not perfectly captured. 'Єдиного входу' is correct for 'Single Sign-On,' but 'атрибути' (attributes) can be a bit abstract. A more descriptive term might be preferable depending on the target audience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to something like 'Атрибути автентифікації єдиного входу' (Single Sign-On authentication attributes) if that's the specific meaning intended. Or, 'Поля атрибутів єдиного входу' (Single Sign-On attribute fields).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, the overall sentence structure could be improved for better flow in Ukrainian. It feels a little stiff.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Відповідність атрибутів єдиного входу записам у розділі «Облікові записи».' (Adding the preposition 'у' makes the sentence flow better).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Sự tương ứng của các thuộc tính Đăng nhập một lần với các mục nhập của phần 'Tài khoản' is not fully accurate. 'Single Sign-On' is a concept, and 'Đăng nhập một lần' is a good translation of that. However, the phrase 'correspondence of the attributes' is a bit awkward in Vietnamese. A more natural phrasing is needed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sự liên kết giữa các thuộc tính Đăng nhập một lần với các mục trong phần 'Tài khoản'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of single quotes around 'Tài khoản' may not be the most appropriate formatting in Vietnamese. Double quotes or no quotes might be preferred.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sự liên kết giữa các thuộc tính Đăng nhập một lần với các mục trong phần Tài khoản.
